title: Where are my champions?
body:
I stopped playing LOL for about 2 or 3 years ago, but now i want to play it again, but for for some reason, i needed to change my password maybe because i did not remember it. But i changed the password and then i needed to change my summoner name, i changed it. But all my champions were gone and i was now in level 1, why does something like that happen?
Hope you can help

replies.body:
Hey KofoodVB, 

So you are able to get the most information out of this issue, it would be best to submit a ticket to Riot Support. They should be able to answer all your questions regarding your account.

Riot Support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Good luck! 

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
